title: Challenge Everything!
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>The mango milk was delicious nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah, it really was!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I was nervous trying it at first, but you really wouldn’t mind drinking this everyday from now on, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hey, why don’t the three of us try something new again? Rin has something that Rin wants to try by the three of us nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What is it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>A super spicy cup ramen nya.... They say that while it’s really spicy that you can’t bear it, it would become so addictive that you can’t stop eating it nya!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I-, I’m not really good with.... spicy stuff....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, me too....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It apparently goes well with rice too nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You have to challenge everything, right, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re changing sides too quickly!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
